s: BetterMe offers a suite of mobile apps to help people improve their fitness, lose weight, and adopt a healthier lifestyle. The apps provide users with an AI-based workout program and meal plans based on weight and fitness goals, food preferences, and dietary restrictions.
Since 2017, BetterMe has been on a mission to create a healthier world for everyone.
